title: Which regularities account existence group norm

content.prompt: Which of the following regularities in behavior can most likely be accounted for by the existence of a group norm?

choices.label: Students tend to use less profanity with adults than they do with their peers.
Most people sleep at least six hours a night.
The average annual income of industrial workers in 1972 was $7,250.
People perform well-learned behaviors better in the presence of others than when alone.

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
